attributes.action: Make members of parliament votes public for the European Union Referendum.
attributes.background: To prevent politicians deceiving the UK population by campaigning one way but voting another.

rejection.details:
At the moment, this would be a personal decision for individual MPs.

If you would like Parliament to change the law, to require the votes of MPs to be published, you could start a new petition asking for that. It is worth noting that there is now very little time left for the law to be changed before the referendum on 23 June.
